title: My Inbox to Yours 001 | Permission To Be Who I Am
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

sentences.e56d: My Inbox to Yours 001 | Permission To Be Who I Am

sentences.3d00: Sometimes it’s better to hear from each other, I want to use medium for a few months to start trying that, hope you enjoy the first post in this series …

sentences.6a3d: From: Nicholas Date: Sun, Mar 12, 2017 at 3:31 AMSubject: Re: [3 min read] Gary, A Humble Thank You: 15 Months Ago, You Changed My LifeTo: Gary Vaynerchuk

sentences.fbf2: Gary, I’ve never reached out — because I don’t know how to thank you.

sentences.e5bc: So, cheers to this overdue email.

sentences.e422: My family has been entrepreneurs in our city (Rochester, NY) for nearly 100 years. Everyone has sold/bailed, besides my mother. I am the only one in my families generation to carry the legacy — out of the 26 of us great-grandkids — and I’m proud of that. And it’s because of you.

sentences.7e6a: In 2015, I saw the Monday morning rant and accepted my identity as a corporate heretic. Then, after following along closely and reading crush it — my life completely fast tracked.

sentences.ecca: I was a college drop out for 7 years, but in 2016 I graduated — because of you.

sentences.bdd6: I got a job at a startup and generated $5M of new LTV revenue in 9 months exclusively through Facebook Advertising for my company — 20% growth — because of you.

sentences.0942: In Dec 2015 I started my own business and followed through on my great-grandfathers legacy — because of you.

sentences.e207: In 15 months, I’ve 5x my income in a economically dying city — top 3 in nation — from 50k to 250k — because of you. (Crush it)

sentences.696a: Last week, I helped pay my mothers breast cancer co-pays — because of you.

sentences.d6a1: I will pay off 125k of student debt in 1 year — because of you.

sentences.2959: My kids & wife have a massive advantage in life — because you’ve gave me permission to be who I am.

sentences.4457: There are no words man, there’s just a ton of gratitude and appreciation. My life is more fulfilled than I could have ever imagined.

sentences.071d: No idea how to close this out. I hope this finds you well at the right time brother.

sentences.5ec4: Thanks for reading my new series! If you enjoyed it, hit that heart button below ;)

content: My Inbox to Yours 001 | Permission To Be Who I Am Sometimes it’s better to hear from each other, I want to use medium for a few months to start trying that, hope you enjoy the first post in this series … From: Nicholas Date: Sun, Mar 12, 2017 at 3:31 AMSubject: Re: [3 min read] Gary, A Humble Thank You: 15 Months Ago, You Changed My LifeTo: Gary Vaynerchuk Gary, I’ve never reached out — because I don’t know how to thank you. So, cheers to this overdue email. My family has been entrepreneurs in our city (Rochester, NY) for nearly 100 years. Everyone has sold/bailed, besides my mother. I am the only one in my families generation to carry the legacy — out of the 26 of us great-grandkids — and I’m proud of that. And it’s because of you. In 2015, I saw the Monday morning rant and accepted my identity as a corporate heretic. Then, after following along closely and reading crush it — my life completely fast tracked. I was a college drop out for 7 years, but in 2016 I graduated — because of you. I got a job at a startup and generated $5M of new LTV revenue in 9 months exclusively through Facebook Advertising for my company — 20% growth — because of you. In Dec 2015 I started my own business and followed through on my great-grandfathers legacy — because of you. In 15 months, I’ve 5x my income in a economically dying city — top 3 in nation — from 50k to 250k — because of you. (Crush it) Last week, I helped pay my mothers breast cancer co-pays — because of you. I will pay off 125k of student debt in 1 year — because of you. My kids & wife have a massive advantage in life — because you’ve gave me permission to be who I am. There are no words man, there’s just a ton of gratitude and appreciation. My life is more fulfilled than I could have ever imagined. No idea how to close this out. I hope this finds you well at the right time brother. Thanks for reading my new series! If you enjoyed it, hit that heart button below ;)
